description: [REvil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0496) has been executed via malicious MS Word e-mail attachments.(Citation: G Data Sodinokibi June 2019)(Citation: McAfee REvil October 2019)(Citation: Picus Sodinokibi January 2020)
